column5: 1. Private bedroom/bathroom with parking for 1 car on the drive way 2. Queen Size Bed  3. 50 MBPS Fast WiFi 4. Close to the 3 main freeways/tollways, Legacy shopping and office district, Stonebriar Mall etc. 5. Large park behind house with walking trail.  6. RO Purified water 7. Bath Towel & Toiletries provided 8. Keyless Entry with your Smartphone 9. Flexible Check-in & Check out time 10. Lastly but most importantly, host who is always happy to help :-)
column8: Private Bed & Bath in a well connected smarthome
